meanings: attack, go at, lick, abuse, beat

vlive.korean: 제가 잔소리를 감히 해대겠습니다 여러분들에게. I will nag you. 듣기 View video V DRAMA : [Full]매드독 X 앞터V (Mad Dog X Early Interview)
술만 먹으면 막 자꾸 V 해대고... But I keep making V when I get drunk. 듣기 View video DICKPUNKS : [딕펑스] 박가람
vlive.english: But I keep making V when I get drunk.

vlive.korean: '솔로 탈출할 것 같다고 자랑을 해댔지'. - 좋네. "And I told them that I will be a couple soon". - Nice. 듣기 View video 스튜디오 룰루랄라 (Studio LuluLala) : [취중막말] ep.5 숙취해소하는 취중뷰티 꿀팁 대방출!?
vlive.english: "And I told them that I will be a couple soon". - Nice.

vlive.korean: 좀 얘기를 하신 적이 있나요? - 얼마나 설명을 해대는지... what this show is about? - I don't know how detailed she explained it. 듣기 View video V DRAMA : [Full]의문의 일승 X 앞터V (Oh, the Mysterious X Early Interview)
vlive.english: what this show is about? - I don't know how detailed she explained it.

vlive.korean: "TRAIN TO BUSAN" 때문에 케이블에서 재난영화를 그렇게 해대요. I saw cable channels show a lot of disaster movies because of "TRAIN TO BUSAN." 듣기 View video 10PM : [10pm2 목] 김태훈, 정시우의 무비톡톡! (게스트: 부산행 신스틸러) Movie talk!talk!
vlive.english: I saw cable channels show a lot of disaster movies because of "TRAIN TO BUSAN."
